snippet.title: Love Ribbon Trailer
snippet.description:
"Love Ribbon" is an yuri visual novel about love between two sisters. 
Out now on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/559610
And itch.io: https://razzartvisual.itch.io/loveribbon
